name: prompt-alchemy-docker
description: AI prompt generation and optimization toolkit with self-learning capabilities (Docker version)

tools.name: generate_prompts
tools.description: Generate AI prompts using the three-phase alchemical process with self-learning enhancement. Supports phase_selection (best/cascade/all), temperature, max_tokens, and optimize parameters.

tools.name: search_prompts
tools.description: Search existing prompts using vector similarity

tools.name: get_prompt
tools.description: Retrieve a specific prompt by ID

tools.name: optimize_prompt
tools.description: Optimize prompts using AI-powered meta-prompting with iterative improvements
